about.title: About Us
about.description: Welcome to PetAdopt, where compassion meets purpose. Our mission is simple yet profound: to provide a safe haven for animals in need, offering them refuge, care, and a second chance at a loving home. Join us in our journey to create a world where every paw print leaves a trail of hope.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Have questions or want to help? Reach out to us and be part of making a difference for animals in need.
